Package me.drkapdor.funbazeapi.api.npc.event

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PlayerNPCEvent
    Represents an event fired when an action between a player and a me.kapdor.rpjobs.api.npc occurs.
    PlayerNPCHideEvent
    An event fired when a me.dekapdor.api.npc is hidden for a certain player.
    PlayerNPCInteractEvent
    An event called when a player interacts with a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc.
    PlayerNPCShowEvent
    An event fired when a NPC is shown for a certain player.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerNPCHideEvent.Reason
    Represents a reason why a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc was hidden for a player.
    PlayerNPCInteractEvent.EntityUseAction
    A wrapper for the interact action with a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc.
    PlayerNPCInteractEvent.Hand
    A wrapper for the hand used for interacts.
